solution_line_template: Every day, Sanya can wash {towels_per_wash} x {hours_per_day} = <<{towels_per_wash}*{hours_per_day}={towels_per_day}>>{towels_per_day} bath towels.
To wash all the towels, she will need {total_towels} / {towels_per_day} = <<{total_towels}/{towels_per_day}={days_needed}>>{days_needed} days.
